name: plato
intro: Plato was an Athenian philosopher during the Classical period in Ancient Greece, founder of the Platonist school of thought and the Academy, the first institution of higher learning in the Western world. A student of Socrates, his philosophical dialogues, featuring Socrates as the main character, explore justice, beauty, equality, political philosophy, theology, cosmology, epistemology, and the philosophy of language. His Theory of Forms remains a central tenet of Platonism.
